content: <?xml version="1.0"?> <rdf:RDF   xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#"   xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/"   xmlns:atom="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom"   xmlns="http://purl.org/rss/1.0/" >  <channel rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?RSS&L=DIPVAC&v=1.0">  <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?RSS&L=DIPVAC&v=1.0</dc:identifier>  <title>DIPVAC List</title>  <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?A0=DIPVAC</link>  <description>DIPVAC List Archives</description>  <dc:date>2015-02-26T12:52:20Z</dc:date>  <image rdf:resource="http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif"/>    <items>   <rdf:Seq>     <rdf:li resource="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DIPVAC;acb1c8fe.1502"/> <rdf:li resource="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DIPVAC;81385bcf.1502"/> <rdf:li resource="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DIPVAC;61f5db81.1412"/> <rdf:li resource="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DIPVAC;dd7e352e.1408"/> <rdf:li resource="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DIPVAC;97feebca.1407"/>     </rdf:Seq>  </items>   </channel>  <image rdf:about="http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif">     <title>Powered by L-Soft's LISTSERV mailing list manager</title>     <link>http://www.lsoft.com/products/listserv-powered.asp</link>     <url>http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif</url> </image>   <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DIPVAC;acb1c8fe.1502">   <title>NCL University MA/MLitt bursary awards </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DIPVAC;acb1c8fe.1502</link>   <description> With apologies for cross-posting.<br><br>The School of English Literature, Language and Linguistics at Newcastle University is pleased to announce the launch of its Master's School Bursary competition for September 2015 entry. We are offering six bursaries, worth \ufffd\ufffd12,000 each (full fees and maintenance), and all bursary holders will also be mentored towards developing doctoral applications. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-26T12:45:10+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Heike Pichler</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DIPVAC;acb1c8fe.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DIPVAC;81385bcf.1502">   <title>International Conference,, Micro-/macro-: What issues at stake in English Linguistics? </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DIPVAC;81385bcf.1502</link>   <description> **<br><br>*International Conference*<br><br>*Micro-/macro-: What issues at stake in English Linguistics?*<br><br>**<br><br>*Dates*: 8-10 October 2015<br><br>*Location*: Metz, Universit\ufffd\ufffd de Lorraine<br><br>*Organised by*: IDEA Research Laboratory (Interdisciplinarity in English<br>Studies) EA2338<br><br>*Call for papers*:<br><br>\ufffd\ufffd Le texte se pr\ufffd\ufffdsente comme une extrapolation de la phrase. \ufffd\ufffd<br>(M. Wilmet, /Grammaire critique du fran\ufffd\ufffdais, /Paris, Hachette-Duculot,<br>1997, p. 582)<br><br>\ufffd\ufffd La construction interne d\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdune clause est essentiellement faite de<br>rapports de rection (s\ufffd\ufffdlections, accords) (\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd) Au-del\ufffd\ufffd la combinatoire<br>est d'une tout autre nature [reposant] sur des rapports de<br>pr\ufffd\ufffdsupposition ou de production d'information. \ufffd\ufffd (A. Berrendonner, \ufffd\ufffd La<br>phrase et les articulations [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-01T22:12:58+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Isabelle Gaudy-Campbell</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DIPVAC;81385bcf.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DIPVAC;61f5db81.1412">   <title>ESRC funding for PhD/MA + PhD in linguistics/English language at Newcastle University </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DIPVAC;61f5db81.1412</link>   <description> WITH APOLOGIES FOR CROSS-POSTING<br><br>The School of English Literature, Language and Linguistics at Newcastle University, UK, seeks outstanding applicants for NEDTC studentships on our PhD programme in English Language and Linguistics through the North East Doctoral Training Centre (NEDTC). NEDTC is a joint venture between Newcastle University and Durham University. A centre of excellence for postgraduate social science scholarship, NEDTC is one of the largest and most innovative of the ESRC's national network of doctoral training centres. For the 2015/16 studentship competition, NEDTC has available 36 fully-funded awards for PG studies commencing in 2015/16. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-12-04T11:33:04+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Heike Pichler</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DIPVAC;61f5db81.1412</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DIPVAC;dd7e352e.1408">   <title>course on language contact </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DIPVAC;dd7e352e.1408</link>   <description> Dear DiPVaC people,<br><br>I am teaching a course on language/dialect contact for the first time.<br>Does anyone have any favorite exercises, data sets, readings, etc.,<br>you'd be willing to suggest? I'll give you props in my class!<br><br>Many thanks, and best wishes for the autumn semester,<br>Elizabeth   </description>   <dc:date>2014-08-21T15:43:10+03:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Elizabeth Peterson</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DIPVAC;dd7e352e.1408</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DIPVAC;97feebca.1407">   <title>journal article + panel proposal </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DIPVAC;97feebca.1407</link>   <description> Dear DiPVaCers,<br><br>As promised at DiPVaC2, here is a link to our recently published article on<br>/pliis /in Finnish -- with thanks to the DiPVaC audience in the<br>acknowlegments!<br><br>http://www.degruyter.com/view/j/jplr_jplr.2014.10.issue-2_2014-06-30--13-29-50/issue-files/jplr.2014.10.issue-2.xml<br><br>If for some reason you cannot get the article through your university,<br>please send me a message and I'd be happy to send you a PDF. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-07-14T20:06:53+03:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Elizabeth Peterson</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DIPVAC;97feebca.1407</dc:identifier> </item>   </rdf:RDF>
